file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-50-03-04 - CARGO LOADING/UNLOADING RAMP - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CARGO LOADING/UNLOADING RAMP - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures for the removal/installation of the cargo loading/unloading ramp. B. The cargo loading/unloading ramp is installed in the baggage compartment, at zone 271. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY CARGO LOADING/UNLOADING RAMP - ALL 25-50-03-000-802-A REMOVAL CARGO LOADING/UNLOADING RAMP - ALL 25-50-03-400-802-A INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-50-03 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-50-03-000-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. CARGO LOADING/UNLOADING RAMP - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the removal of the cargo loading/unloading ramp. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 52-30-00/1 C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure that the aircraft is safe for maintenance. (2) Open the baggage compartment door (AMM SDS 52-30-00/1). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Lift the cargo loading/unloading ramp (3). (2) Remove the screws (1) and washers (2). (3) Remove the cargo loading/unloading ramp (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 25-50-03 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Cargo Loading/Unloading Ramp - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 271 1. SCREW (12) 2. WASHER (12) 3. CARGO LOADING/UNLOADING RAMP DET. A 145AMM250114.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 25-50-03 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-50-03-400-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. CARGO LOADING/UNLOADING RAMP - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the installation of the cargo loading/unloading ramp. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 52-30-00/1 C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the cargo loading/unloading ramp (3) in the installation position. (2) Install the cargo loading/unloading ramp (3) with the screws (1) and washers (2). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the baggage compartment door (AMM SDS 52-30-00/1).
